analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0x3d566454c7b2cdd382925380afb82bfb44e3c7b6.sol:
	Contract SMRDistributionVault has payable functions:
	 - SMRDistributionVault (/unique_chucks/20/0x3d566454c7b2cdd382925380afb82bfb44e3c7b6.sol#481-490)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
